channel.title: TensorFlow2.0 on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in TensorFlow2.0 on Some Title

item.title: [Model construction] Using the data set of Reuters communication, create a model (MLP) that classifies news into topics with keras (TensorFlow 2 system)
item.description: ## Last pre-processing! This article is a sequel to [Pre-processing]. [Pre-processing] Creating a model (MLP) for classifying news into topics using Reuters communication data set (TensorFlow 2 series) Please refer to the pre-processing section for the operating environment. Model learning Create a model using the preprocessed news article text x_train and the news label y_train. This time, we will use a two-layer MLP (Multilayer Perceptron) as a simple model.
